mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Bryan, John Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Roscksprings Center Co., PA [Roscksprings Center County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Bryan, John Henry Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Incomplete fracture left tibia upper third caused by his horse falling on the leg. Also orchitis right testicle. Location Wounded: Cumberland. Date Wounded: 1864/11/12. Nature of Wound: Kick [fall?] of horse. Result: Furloughed 1864/12/22. Returned 1865/01/12. Transferred to wash house. Recovery and returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bryan, John Henry
Incomplete fracture left tibia upper third caused by his horse falling on the leg. Also orchitis right testicle
